casebody.data:
Charles H. POPE, Plaintiff in Error, v. BIBB MANUFACTURING COMPANY, Defendant in Error. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. October 6, 1927. No. 15.

Before MANTON, L. HAND, and SWAN, Circuit Judges.

Hendrick & Hendrick, of New York City (John H. Hendrick, of New York City, of counsel), for plaintiff in error. Boot, Clark, Buckner & Howland, of New York City (Grenville Clark, Cloyd La Porte, and Joseph Sehreiber, all of New York City, of counsel), for defendant in error. PER CURIAM.

Judgment (22 F.[2d] 557) affirmed in open court.
